h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><h2 data-id="heading-0">前言</h2>
<p>如果想要更加的了解非父子组件传值，首先要了解父传子的思维逻辑，这样非父组件传值会更加的了解、</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">非父子组件传值（兄弟组件传值）</h2>
<ul>
<li>要了解非父组件传值首先好了解 <code>$emit</code> 和 <code>$on</code> , <code>$emit(event,data)</code> 里面有两个参数第一个参数是触发的事件类型，第二个值是触发这个事件传递的参数,<code>$on(event, callFn(data))</code>同样<code>$on</code>里面也有两个参数，第一个参数是绑定的事件类型，第二个值是绑定的这个事件所对应的回调函数，里面的<code>data</code>值是<code>$emit</code>中传过来的值。</li>
</ul>
<p>1、首先要定义一个bus（一个vue实例，用来接收事件和触发事件），代码如下、</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">       <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Vue <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'vue'</span>
       <span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Vue()
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>2、首先将组件引入到页面上</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><template>
  <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"home"</span>></span>
      <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">childrenOne</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">childrenOne</span>></span> 
      <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">children</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">children</span>></span>
      
  <span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">div</span>></span></span>
</template>

<span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">script</span>></span><span class="javascript">
<span class="hljs-comment">//引入公共页面</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> children <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'./children.vue'</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> childrenOne <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'./childrenOne.vue'</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'Home'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">data</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span>&#123;&#125;,
  <span class="hljs-attr">components</span>: &#123;<span class="hljs-comment">//注册</span>
    children,
    childrenOne
  &#125;
&#125;
</span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">script</span>></span></span>

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>3、在childOne组件中将数据传入中间变量中（bus）,代码如下</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><template>
    <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">div</span>></span>
        $emit&#123;&#123;namea&#125;&#125;
    <span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">div</span>></span></span>
</template>
<span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">script</span>></span><span class="javascript">
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> bus <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'../utli/bus'</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">data</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span>&#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>&#123;
            <span class="hljs-attr">namea</span>:<span class="hljs-string">"我是谁"</span>,
            <span class="hljs-attr">listone</span>:<span class="hljs-string">'3332113221'</span>
        &#125;
    &#125;,
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">created</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">//将数值传入bus中</span>
        bus.$emit(<span class="hljs-string">"woshishi"</span>,<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.namea)
    &#125;,
&#125;
</span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">script</span>></span></span>
<span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">style</span> <span class="hljs-attr">lang</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"less"</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">style</span>></span></span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>4、在另一个组件中运用<code>$on</code>去监听<code>bus</code>中间变量中的值，然后再页面中显示出来</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><template>
    <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">div</span>></span>
        $on&#123;&#123;namea&#125;&#125;
    <span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">div</span>></span></span>
</template>
<span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">script</span>></span><span class="javascript">
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> bus <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'../utli/bus'</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">data</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span>&#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>&#123;
            <span class="hljs-attr">namea</span>:<span class="hljs-string">"wss"</span>
        &#125;
    &#125;,
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">created</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
        bus.$on(<span class="hljs-string">"woshishi"</span>,<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">val</span>)=></span>&#123;
            <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.namea = val
        &#125;)
    &#125;,
&#125;
</span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">script</span>></span></span>
<span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">style</span> <span class="hljs-attr">lang</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"less"</span>></span>
    
<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">style</span>></span></span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre></div>  
</div>
